ComicInfo.Title: Six Degrees, Part 2 - All In The Family
ComicInfo.Summary:
Roy Harper becomes more resolved to take charge of his life as he trails the one man who may be able to save Lian's life: the immortal villain Vandal Savage. But there are parts of his past Arsenal can't run from, and he soon faces Oliver Queen's son, Green Arrow.
